metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3733 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in WebApp Installs in Google Chrome prior to 115.0.5790.98 allowed a remote attacker to potentially spoof the contents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

notes.Note: alexmurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
